ReturnedTax.title: Returned Goods Duty and Tax Exemption
ReturnedTax.description: DHL Express requires a Returned Goods Tax Exemption Petition in order to handle the Duty and Tax exemption of this shipment through customs.
ReturnedTax.toolTip: Please ensure that your documents are stamped and signed.

PassportImg.title: Passport Image
PassportImg.description: Please upload a copy of the photo page of your passport.

ReturnedTaxImg.description: Please upload a copy of your GERİ GELEN ESYA MUAF DİLEKÇE petition to gain exemption from duties and taxes for the customs clearance of this shipment.

PassportNumText.title: Passport Number
PassportNumText.formatvalidation: Passport number cannot contain any special characters or spaces
PassportNumText.validationErrorMessage: Your passport number cannot contain any spaces or special characters.

TexPlateImg.description: Please upload the tax plate image of your company for the customs clearance of this shipment.
